mockups.content:
# UI/UX Mockups for Basic App

Based on the masterplan, I'll create mockups for the essential screens of the Basic App. Since the app's specific purpose is not yet defined, I'll design a flexible, clean interface that can be adapted to various use cases while adhering to the principles of simplicity and usability.

## 1. Welcome/Onboarding Screen

**Purpose:** This screen introduces users to the app and provides a brief overview of its key features. It serves as the entry point for new users and helps set expectations.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- App Logo -->
  <circle cx="180" cy="180" r="70" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="195" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Basic App</text>
  
  <!-- Welcome Text -->
  <text x="180" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Welcome to Basic App</text>
  <text x="180" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Your simple solution for everyday tasks</text>
  
  <!-- Get Started Button -->
  <rect x="80" y="400" width="200" height="50" rx="25" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="430" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Get Started</text>
  
  <!-- Login Link -->
  <text x="180" y="480" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Already have an account? Log in</text>
  
  <!-- Version Info -->
  <text x="180" y="620" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Version 1.0.0</text>
</svg>
```

## 2. Home Screen / Dashboard

**Purpose:** The main hub of the app where users can access all primary features. This screen provides an overview of relevant information and quick access to core functionalities.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <!-- Header -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Home</text>
  <circle cx="330" cy="52" r="16" fill="#f0f0f0"/>
  <text x="330" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  
  <!-- Search Bar -->
  <rect x="16" y="96" width="328" height="40" rx="20" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="46" y="121" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#999">Search...</text>
  <circle cx="31" cy="116" r="10" fill="none" stroke="#999" stroke-width="1.5"/>
  
  <!-- Feature Cards -->
  <rect x="16" y="152" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="94" y="212" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 1</text>
  
  <rect x="188" y="152" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="266" y="212" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 2</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="288" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="94" y="348" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 3</text>
  
  <rect x="188" y="288" width="156" height="120" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="266" y="348" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">Feature 4</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Activity Section -->
  <text x="16" y="440" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Activity</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="455" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="66" y="485" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Activity item 1</text>
  <text x="66" y="505" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999">2 hours ago</text>
  <circle cx="36" cy="485" r="12" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <rect x="16" y="525" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="66" y="555" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Activity item 2</text>
  <text x="66" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999">Yesterday</text>
  <circle cx="36" cy="555" r="12" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <!-- Navigation Bar -->
  <rect y="600" width="360" height="40" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="60" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Home</text>
  <text x="180" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Explore</text>
  <text x="300" y="625" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Profile</text>
</svg>
```

## 3. Feature Detail Screen

**Purpose:** This screen displays detailed information about a specific feature or functionality. It provides in-depth content and actions related to the selected feature.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <!-- Header -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="60" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Feature Details</text>
  <!-- Back Button -->
  <text x="16" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#333">←</text>
  <!-- Options Menu -->
  <text x="344" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">⋮</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Image -->
  <rect x="16" y="96" width="328" height="180" rx="8" fill="#e0e0e0"/>
  <text x="180" y="186" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#999" text-anchor="middle">Feature Image</text>
  
  <!-- Feature Title and Description -->
  <text x="16" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="22" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Feature Title</text>
  <text x="16" y="330" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666">
    <tspan x="16" dy="0">This is a detailed description of the feature. It explains</tspan>
    <tspan x="16" dy="20">what the feature does and how users can benefit from it.</tspan>
    <tspan x="16" dy="20">Additional details can be provided here to help users</tspan>
    <tspan x="16" dy="20">understand the functionality better.</tspan>
  </text>
  
  <!-- Feature Stats -->
  <rect x="16" y="410" width="156" height="80" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="94" y="440" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">42</text>
  <text x="94" y="465" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Stat 1</text>
  
  <rect x="188" y="410" width="156" height="80" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="266" y="440" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">85%</text>
  <text x="266" y="465" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Stat 2</text>
  
  <!-- Action Buttons -->
  <rect x="16" y="510" width="328" height="50" rx="25" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="180" y="540" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Primary Action</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="570" width="156" height="50" rx="25" fill="white" stroke="#4a90e2" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="94" y="600" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Action 1</text>
  
  <rect x="188" y="570" width="156" height="50" rx="25" fill="white" stroke="#4a90e2" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="266" y="600" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">Action 2</text>
</svg>
```

## 4. Settings Screen

**Purpose:** This screen allows users to customize their app experience and manage account settings. It provides access to preferences, account information, and app configuration options.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <!-- Header -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="60" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Settings</text>
  <!-- Back Button -->
  <text x="16" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#333">←</text>
  
  <!-- Profile Section -->
  <rect x="16" y="96" width="328" height="80" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <circle cx="56" cy="136" r="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <text x="56" y="142" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  <text x="96" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">User Name</text>
  <text x="96" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666">user@example.com</text>
  <text x="328" y="136" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">Edit</text>
  
  <!-- Settings Sections -->
  <text x="16" y="200" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">ACCOUNT</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="210" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="240" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Personal Information</text>
  <text x="344" y="240" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="260" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Security</text>
  <text x="344" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="310" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Notifications</text>
  <text x="344" y="340" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <text x="16" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">PREFERENCES</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="390" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Language</text>
  <text x="344" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">English →</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="440" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="470" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Theme</text>
  <text x="344" y="470" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">Light →</text>
  
  <text x="16" y="520" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" fill="#999">ABOUT</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="530" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="560" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Help & Support</text>
  <text x="344" y="560" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="580" width="328" height="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="16" y="610" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Terms & Privacy</text>
  <text x="344" y="610" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#999" text-anchor="end">→</text>
</svg>
```

## 5. User Profile Screen

**Purpose:** This screen displays user-specific information and activity history. It allows users to view and edit their profile details and see a summary of their interactions with the app.

```svg
<svg width="360" height="640" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="360" height="640" fill="#f5f7fa"/>
  
  <!-- Status Bar -->
  <rect width="360" height="24" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  
  <!-- Header -->
  <rect y="24" width="360" height="56" fill="white"/>
  <text x="60" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Profile</text>
  <!-- Back Button -->
  <text x="16" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" fill="#333">←</text>
  <!-- Settings Button -->
  <text x="344" y="58" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">⚙️</text>
  
  <!-- Profile Header -->
  <rect y="80" width="360" height="180" fill="#4a90e2"/>
  <circle cx="180" cy="140" r="50" fill="white"/>
  <text x="180" y="150" font-family="Arial" font-size="36" fill="#4a90e2" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  <text x="180" y="220" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">User Name</text>
  <text x="180" y="245" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Member since January 2023</text>
  
  <!-- Stats Section -->
  <rect y="260" width="120" height="70" fill="white"/>
  <text x="60" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">125</text>
  <text x="60" y="315" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Activities</text>
  
  <rect x="120" y="260" width="120" height="70" fill="white"/>
  <text x="180" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">45</text>
  <text x="180" y="315" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Completed</text>
  
  <rect x="240" y="260" width="120" height="70" fill="white"/>
  <text x="300" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="#333" text-anchor="middle">80%</text>
  <text x="300" y="315" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Success</text>
  
  <!-- Activity Section -->
  <text x="16" y="360" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Activity</text>
  
  <rect x="16" y="375" width="328" height="60" rx="8" fill="white" stroke="#ddd" stroke-width="1"/>
  <text x="16" y="400" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333">Activity 1</text>
  <text x="16" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#999">
